title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Blaming Tebow, Rookie QB Reviews, Triple H Live in Vegas
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Blaming Tebow, Rookie QB Reviews, Triple H Live in Vegas
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast, with highlights from the live episode recorded prior to WWE's SummerSlam in Las Vegas. Colin rants on why he might never talk about Tim Tebow again (:25), and which rookie QB is most likely to win a playoff game this year (4:38). Aqib Talib on why Cam Newton should be the starter in New England over Mac Jones (12:45). Dave Wannstedt on why Justin Fields needs to pump the brakes in Chicago (21:55). Plus, Triple H on his possible return to the ring against The Rock (28:15).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
